metadata.title: CVE-2021-32434 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
abcm2ps v8.14.11 was discovered to contain an out-of-bounds read in thefunction calculate_beam at draw.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-32434` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

abcm2ps - 8.14.6-0.1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: abcm2ps package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.14.6-0.1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
